200.description: List of canned replies returned successfully.

delete.description: Delete a canned reply by UUID.

post.description: Send a media (image, video, document, etc.) message to a contact by phone number.

phone.description: Recipient phone number in international format

media_type.description: Type of media (image, video, document, audio, sticker)

media_url.description: Publicly accessible URL of the media file

post.description: Send a pre-approved template message to a contact by phone number.

phone.description: Recipient phone number in international format

name.description: Template name as approved in WhatsApp Business Manager

post.description: Upload a media file to obtain a media identifier for later sending.

media_type.description: Type of media (image, video, document, audio, sticker)

caption.description: Optional caption for supported media types

get.description: Retrieve a list of available message templates.

post.description: Add a note to a contact.

get.description: Retrieve notes for a contact by UUID.
Retrieve conversations for a contact by UUID.

post.description: Authenticate with email and password to receive an API token.

get.description: Validate that the provided API key is active.
